channel.title: Vykor re-developed
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img922/5182/UkK4LC.png[/img][/center][/center]
[center]Vykor has been in development for a while now, and it's time to see what the community thinks of what we've done so far.[/center]
[center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WC4_oPQ0dC4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/center]
[center][b]Features:[/b][/center] [center]Nightmare Zone minigame[/center] [center]Fight caves & fight pits[/center] [center]Fully working pest control[/center] [center]fully working barrows[/center] [center]Crafting, thieving, fletching, firemaking, cooking, fishing, slayer, woodcutting mining, smithing, runecrafting, herb. (agility, hunter, farming to be added)[/center] [center]Zombie minigame, whole server can play, 16 waves with random bosses each wave with scattered zombies that are aggressive[/center] [center]Duo slayer[/center] [center]6 quests (RFD, DT, cooks assistant, dragon slayer, HFTD, Dorics quest[/center] [center]custom client, with full screen option[/center] [center]Full Godwars maps, with all bosses[/center] [center]multiple bosses (kbd, kq, icequeen dagg kings, chaos elemetal[/center] [center]Saradomin sword healing works[/center] [center]Guthans, dh all work just like Runescape[/center] [center]Achievement System[/center] [center]Membership system[/center]
[center]https://gyazo.com/776386030831f3bfcc8462d4ffd4cd64[/center] [center]https://gyazo.com/c1b548254fbfce829c03cceadaeee499[/center] [center]https://gyazo.com/27f3dce72a96a7e13595452d49d68aec[/center]

[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/1432/ZdZoNI.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img922/4370/dwCZFl.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/8433/c9IXsf.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/6907/gXx3Nq.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img921/7574/YbLe0B.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/5813/1PYRoZ.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img922/8619/zBgFdC.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/1815/bqjj9z.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/8780/BWTGw8.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img922/3748/DyFB9Y.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/7079/Q2Ufgx.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img923/7695/omJmDF.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2449/FdMdDI.png[/img][/center]

[center][b][size=14pt]Any suggestions, input would be greatly appreciated![/size][/b][/center]

item.title: Vykor re-developed
item.dc:creator: @Project_Territh Project Territh
item.description:
@Project_Territh wrote:

[center][center][/center][/center]

[center]Vykor has been in development for a while now, and it’s time to see what the community thinks of what we’ve done so far.[/center]

[center][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WC4_oPQ0dC4&feature=youtu.be[/youtube][/center]

[center]Features:[/center]
[center]Nightmare Zone minigame[/center]
[center]Fight caves & fight pits[/center]
[center]Fully working pest control[/center]
[center]fully working barrows[/center]
[center]Crafting, thieving, fletching, firemaking, cooking, fishing, slayer, woodcutting mining, smithing, runecrafting, herb. (agility, hunter, farming to be added)[/center]
[center]Zombie minigame, whole server can play, 16 waves with random bosses each wave with scattered zombies that are aggressive[/center]
[center]Duo slayer[/center]
[center]6 quests (RFD, DT, cooks assistant, dragon slayer, HFTD, Dorics quest[/center]
[center]custom client, with full screen option[/center]
[center]Full Godwars maps, with all bosses[/center]
[center]multiple bosses (kbd, kq, icequeen dagg kings, chaos elemetal[/center]
[center]Saradomin sword healing works[/center]
[center]Guthans, dh all work just like Runescape[/center]
[center]Achievement System[/center]
[center]Membership system[/center]

[center]https://gyazo.com/776386030831f3bfcc8462d4ffd4cd64[/center]
